name: Night in the Woods
description: NIGHT IN THE WOODS is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character, featuring dozens of characters to meet and lots to do across a lush, vibrant world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: 32-bit systems must use virtual memory to get over 2GB.
